text: Kak mnogobozhniki otnesutsya k etim istinnym slovam? Neuzheli skazhut: "Izmyslil on ikh!"? Yesli oni tak skazhut, otvet' im, o poslannik: "Yesli ya izmyslil ikh na Allakha, kak vy polagayete, to eto - strashnyy grekh, i na mne odnom moyo pregresheniye. No, yesli ya prav, to togda vy sami greshniki, i ya ne prichasten k vashim grekham i ne budu otvechat' za nikh
